description:
A dead simple Wii backup manager.


What's Changed
- ✨ Re-add cover downloading by @mq1 in #167
- ✨ Re-add GC games support by @mq1 in #168
- 🚸 Add list views by @mq1 in #169
- 🐛 Fix expelled drive by @mq1 in #170
- 💄 Add Roboto font by @mq1 in #171
- 💄 New top bar by @mq1 in #172
- 🚸 Add wiki button by @mq1 in #173
- 💄 Reworked grid and list views by @mq1 in #174
- 🚸 Add initial game info dialog by @mq1 in #175
- 💄 Put menu buttons directly in the sidebar by @mq1 in #176
- 🚸 Improve Wiiload UX by @mq1 in #177
- ✨ Sort games/apps by name or size by @mq1 in #178
- 🚸 Better config/top bar/sorting by @mq1 in #179
- dev by @mq1 in #180
- 💄 Re-add menu button by @mq1 in #181
- ✨ Add Disc Info by @mq1 in #182
- 💄 Prettier app info dialog by @mq1 in #183
- ⬆️ Update CI runners by @mq1 in #184
- ⚡️ Optimize grid performance by @mq1 in #185
- 💄 Fix card tooltips and padding by @mq1 in #186
- ⚡️ Improve grid view performance by @mq1 in #188
- 💄 Show OSCWii icons by @mq1 in #189
- ⚡️ Improve list view performance by @mq1 in #190
- 🚸 More robust config format by @mq1 in #191
- ✨ Actually portable build by @mq1 in #192
- 🔥 Remove automatic refreshing by @mq1 in #193
- 🐛 Temp workaround for broken font rendering by @mq1 in #194
- 💄 UI fixes by @mq1 in #195
- 💄 Add app icon by @mq1 in #196
- 🐛 UI fixes by @mq1 in #197
- 🐛 Fix not refreshing by @mq1 in #198
- 🐛 Filtering related bug fixing by @mq1 in #199
- 🐛 Improve font rendering by @mq1 in #200
- 💄 UI fixes by @mq1 in #201
- 🚸 Enable verification for scrubbed files by @mq1 in #202
- ⚡️ Improve scrubbing performance by @mq1 in #203
Full Changelog: 2.5.3...3.0.0
